reference.title: Indexing group elements
reference.shortdesc: The indexing domain provides several new elements for use with indexing. The new elements allow authors to define "See" and "See also" references, and to override the default sort order for a term.

refbody.section: Indexing domain elements typically work with the indexterm and index-base elements; index-base is grouped with elements that are typically useful only in specialization contexts, and can be found using the link below.
